CHAT.comment: ANDREW M. CUOMO, ATTORNEY GENERAL OF NEW YORK, Petitioner v. THE CLEARING HOUSE ASSOCIATION, L.L.C., ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:17 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF BARBARA D. UNDERWOOD ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
ORAL ARGUMENT OF MALCOLM L. STEWART FOR THE RESPONDENT OFFICE OF THE COMPTROLLER OF THE CURRENCY
ORAL ARGUMENT OF SETH P. WAXMAN ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT THE CLEARING HOUSE ASSOCIATION, L.L.C.
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF BARBARA D. UNDERWOOD ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 12:18 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
